verses.t: Paul{G3972}, an apostle{G652} of Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} by{G1223} the will{G2307} of God{G2316}, and{G2532} Timotheus{G5095} our brother{G3588},

To the saints{G40} and{G2532} faithful{G4103} brethren{G80} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} which are at{G1722} Colosse{G2857}: Grace{G5485} be unto you{G5213}, and{G2532} peace{G1515}, from{G575} God{G2316} our{G2257} Father{G3962} and{G2532} the Lord{G2962} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}.the words "which are" con't legitimately be tagged to any Greek words despite that the KJV didn't put them in italics
We give thanks{G2168} to God{G3588} and{G2532} the Father{G3962} of our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, praying{G4336} always{G3842} for{G4012} you{G5216},
Since we heard{G191} of your{G5216} faith{G3588} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}, and{G2532} of the love{G3588} which ye have to{G1519} all{G3956} the saints{G40},
For{G1223} the hope{G3588} which is laid up{G606} for you{G5213} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}, whereof{G3739} ye heard before{G4257} in{G1722} the word{G3588} of the truth{G3588} of the gospel{G3588};

Which is come{G3918} unto{G1519} you{G5209}, as{G2531} it is in{G1722} all{G3956} the world{G3588}; and{G2532} bringeth forth fruit{G2592}, as{G2531} it doth also{G2532} in{G1722} you{G5213}, since{G575} the day{G2250} ye heard{G191} of it, and{G2532} knew{G1921} the grace{G3588} of God{G3588} in{G1722} truth{G225}:

As{G2531} ye{G3129} also{G2532} learned{G3129} of{G575} Epaphras{G1889} our{G2257} dear{G27} fellowservant{G4889}, who{G3739} is{G2076} for{G5228} you{G5216} a faithful{G4103} minister{G1249} of Christ{G3588};
Who{G3588} also{G2532} declared{G1213} unto us{G2254} your{G5216} love{G26} in{G1722} the Spirit{G4151}.

For{G1223} this{G5124} cause{G1223} we{G2249} also{G2532}, since{G575} the day{G2250} we heard{G191} it, do{G3973} not{G3756} cease{G3973} to pray{G4336} for{G5228} you{G5216}, and{G2532} to desire{G154} that{G2443} ye might be filled with{G4137} the knowledge{G3588} of his{G846} will{G3588} in{G1722} all{G3956} wisdom{G4678} and{G2532} spiritual{G4152} understanding{G4907};

That{G4043} ye{G5209} might walk{G4043} worthy{G516} of the Lord{G3588} unto{G1519} all{G3956} pleasing{G699}, being fruitful{G2592} in{G1722} every{G3956} good{G18} work{G2041}, and{G2532} increasing{G837} in{G1519} the knowledge{G3588} of God{G3588}

Strengthened{G1412} with{G1722} all{G3956} might{G1411}, according to{G2596} his{G846} glorious{G3588} power{G3588}, unto{G1519} all{G3956} patience{G5281} and{G2532} longsuffering{G3115} with{G3326} joyfulness{G5479};
Giving thanks{G2168} unto the Father{G3588}, which hath made{G2427} us{G2248} meet{G2427} to{G1519} be partakers{G3588} of the inheritance{G3588} of the saints{G40} in{G1722} light{G3588}:
Who{G3739} hath delivered{G4506} us{G2248} from{G1537} the power{G3588} of darkness{G3588}, and{G2532} hath translated{G3179} us into{G1519} the kingdom{G3588} of his{G846} dear{G3588} Son{G3588}:
In{G1722} whom{G3739} we have{G2192} redemption{G3588} through{G1223} his{G846} blood{G3588}, even the forgiveness{G3588} of sins{G3588}:
Who{G3739} is{G2076} the image{G1504} of the invisible{G517} God{G3588}, the firstborn{G4416} of every{G3956} creature{G2937}:

For{G3754} by{G1722} him{G846} were{G2936} all things{G3956} created{G2936}, that are{G3588} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}, and{G2532} that are{G3588} in{G1909} earth{G3588}, visible{G3707} and{G2532} invisible{G517}, whether{G1535} they be thrones{G2362}, or{G1535} dominions{G2963}, or{G1535} principalities{G746}, or{G1535} powers{G1849}: all things{G3956} were created{G2936} by{G1223} him{G846}, and{G2532} for{G1519} him{G846}:
And{G2532} he{G846} is{G2076} before{G4253} all things{G3956}, and{G2532} by{G1722} him{G846} all things{G3956} consist{G4921}.

And{G2532} he{G846} is{G2076} the head{G3588} of the body{G3588}, the church{G3588}: who{G3739} is{G2076} the beginning{G746}, the firstborn{G4416} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}; that{G2443} in{G1722} all{G3956} things he{G846} might{G1096} have the preeminence{G4409}.
For{G3754} it pleased{G2106} the Father that in{G1722} him{G846} should{G2730} all{G3956} fulness{G3588} dwell{G2730};

And{G2532}, having made peace{G1517} through{G1223} the blood{G3588} of his{G846} cross{G3588}, by{G1223} him{G846} to reconcile{G604} all things{G3956} unto{G1519} himself{G846}; by{G1223} him{G846}, I say, whether{G1535} they be things{G3588} in{G1909} earth{G3588}, or{G1535} things{G3588} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}.

And{G2532} you{G5209}, that were{G5607} sometime{G4218} alienated{G526} and{G2532} enemies{G2190} in{G3588} your mind{G1271} by{G1722} wicked{G4190} works{G3588}, yet{G1161} now{G3570} hath he reconciled{G604}

In{G1722} the body{G3588} of his{G846} flesh{G3588} through{G1223} death{G3588}, to present{G3936} you{G5209} holy{G40} and{G2532} unblameable{G299} and{G2532} unreproveable{G410} in{G2714} his{G846} sight{G2714}:

If{G1489} ye continue in{G1961} the faith{G3588} grounded{G2311} and{G2532} settled{G1476}, and{G2532} be not{G3361} moved away{G3334} from{G575}the hope{G3588} of the gospel{G3588}, which{G3739} ye have heard{G191}, and which was preached{G2784} to{G1722} every{G3956} creature{G3588} which is under{G5259} heaven{G3588}; whereof{G3739} I{G1473} Paul{G3972} am made{G1096} a minister{G1249};"which is" not tagged to any Greek word

Who{G3739} now{G3568} rejoice{G5463} in{G1722} my{G3450} sufferings{G3588} for{G5228} you{G5216}, and{G2532} fill up{G466} that which is behind{G3588} of the afflictions{G3588} of Christ{G3588} in{G1722} my{G3450} flesh{G3588} for{G5228} his{G846} body's{G3588} sake{G5228}, which{G3739} is{G2076} the church{G3588}:

Whereof{G3739} I{G1473} am made{G1096} a minister{G1249}, according to{G2596} the dispensation{G3588} of God{G3588} which is given{G1325} to me{G3427} for{G1519} you{G5209}, to fulfil{G4137} the word{G3588} of God{G3588};
Even the mystery{G3588} which hath been hid{G613} from{G575} ages{G3588} and{G2532} from{G575} generations{G3588}, but{G1161} now{G3570} is made manifest{G5319} to{G40} his{G846} saints{G40}:

To whom{G3739} God{G3588} would{G2309} make known{G1107} what{G5101} is the riches{G3588} of the glory{G3588} of this{G5127} mystery{G3588} among{G1722} the Gentiles{G3588}; which{G3739} is{G2076} Christ{G5547} in{G1722} you{G5213}, the hope{G3588} of glory{G3588}:

Whom{G3739} we{G2249} preach{G2605}, warning{G3560} every{G3956} man{G444}, and{G2532} teaching{G1321} every{G3956} man{G444} in{G1722} all{G3956} wisdom{G4678}; that{G2443} we may present{G3936} every{G3956} man{G444} perfect{G5046} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}:
Whereunto{G1519} I{G2872} also{G2532} labour{G2872}, striving{G75} according to{G2596} his{G846} working{G3588}, which worketh{G1754} in{G1722} me{G1698} mightily{G1411}.
